solution_line_template: Every bus has a capacity of: {train_capacity} * {bus_capacity_fraction} = <<{train_capacity}*{bus_capacity_fraction}={single_bus_capacity}>>{single_bus_capacity} people.
Combined, both the buses have a capacity of {single_bus_capacity} * {number_of_buses}= <<{single_bus_capacity}*{number_of_buses}={combined_bus_capacity}>>{combined_bus_capacity} people.
